import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import SessionContext from '../contexts/SessionContext' import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' export default () => { const { openLogin, openSignUp, isLoggedIn, setLogin } = useContext(SessionContext) const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem("token") setLogin(false) } return ( <> Navbar
Home Features Pricing

Navbar

Home { isLoggedIn ? <> Profile Search for Recipes Upload Food Image : null } { isLoggedIn ? : <> } ) }
